entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 01 January 2023
